_BE_inc.description: Defined as dollar change in taxable income divided by dollar change in after-tax income caused by the reform.  Must be zero or negative.

_BE_sub.description: Defined as proportional change in taxable income divided by proportional change in marginal net-of-tax rate (1-MTR) on taxpayer earnings caused by the reform.  Must be zero or positive.

_BE_cg.description: Defined as change in logarithm of long-term capital gains divided by change in marginal tax rate (MTR) on long-term capital gains caused by the reform.  Must be zero or negative.  Read Behavior.response documentation for discussion of appropriate values.
